controller

Class CentralController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AbstractController
      • controller.CentralController

  • public class CentralController
extends AbstractController
    Controller for building connection and managing registered controllers responsible for "CONNECT", "STUN" and "TURN" message
    Author:
    Yifan Ruan (ry222ad@student.lnu.se)

        userId - the user id, identifying who owns the controller
        hostPort - the host port
        relayServerAddress - the relay server IP address
        STUNServerPort - the STUN server port
        TURNServerPort - the TURN server port
